text: I've always lived along this river my
name is Richard white and I grew up here
on Standing Rock all the way down the
river from cannonball for Yates I've a
slam and different places fished on it
yeah it's just there's so much cool
along the river and yeah the oil line
pipe goes through breaks it's there's
going to be no more that at one time
Army Corps engineer flooded it out and
they ruined a beautiful horse we had a
long river here that was something else
for energy some they missed the river up
then and they're going to do it again if
this they continue to keep trying to
push this pipeline I think that my days
would be longer but it is getting
shorter and I'm starting to look at
things but more and the bigger picture I
wouldn't be here if it wasn't for these
three granddaughters they're the
carriers of life they're going to bring
our next generations in
you
